parameter.name: side
parameter.description: 0 - main device or left earbud 1 - right earbud if exists

parameter.name: available languages
parameter.description: param 2 to param n (as many as needed to report all available languages)  4 uint8 values: byte 0 - Language id byte 1 - VP Major version byte 2 - VP Minor version byte 3 - VP patch version

parameter.name: available languages
parameter.description: param 2 to param n (as many as needed to report all available languages)  4 uint8 values: byte 0 - Language id byte 1 - VP Major version byte 2 - VP Minor version byte 3 - VP patch version

parameter.name: sizeOfUpgradeFile
parameter.description: the size of the upgrade file

parameter.name: upgradePhase
parameter.description: 0x00: GAIA_UPGRADE_MODE_IDLE 0x01: GAIA_UPGRADE_READY_FOR_UPGRADE 0x02: GAIA_UPGRADE_PROGRESS_RECEIVING 0x03: GAIA_UPGRADE_PROGRESS_SENDING 0x04: GAIA_UPGRADE_PROGRESS_VALIDATING 0x05: GAIA_UPGRADE_PROGRESS_FINISHED

parameter.name: default
parameter.description: true if current config is default config else false

Params.name: default
Params.note: true if current config is default one

parameter.name: button number
parameter.description: 0x00 touch right earbud  0x01 touch left earbud

parameter.name: pattern
parameter.description: 0x00  Repeat 0x01   1  Tap 0x02  2 Tap 0x03  3 Tap 0x04  Long Press 0x05  Long Press Release 0x06  Very Long Press 0x07  Very Long Press Release 0x08  Very Very Long Press 0x09  Very Very Long Press Release

parameter.name: function
parameter.description: 0x00 none 0x01  play / pause 0x02 next song 0x03 previous song 0x04 Vol  0x05 Vol- 0x06 Transparent Hearing 0x07 Invoke VA 0x80 accept call 0x81  reject call 0xF0 - 0xFF custom controls

Params.name: button_number
Params.note: 0x00 touch right earbud,  0x01 touch left earbud

Params.name: pattern
Params.note: 0x00, Repeat 0x01, 1 Tap, 0x02 2 Tap, 0x03  3 Tap, 0x04 Long Press, 0x05  Long Press Release, 0x06  Very Long Press, 0x07  Very Long Press Release, 0x08  Very Very Long Press, 0x09  Very Very Long Press Release

Params.name: function
Params.note: 0x00 none, 0x01  play / pause, 0x02 next song, 0x03 previous song, 0x04 Vol , 0x05 Vol-, 0x06 Transparent Hearing, 0x07 Invoke VA, 0xF0 - 0xFF custom controls

properties.name: BluetoothCompatibilityMode
properties.note: If set, might disable some features but provide more stable BT connection or less dropout

parameter.name: payloadWord
parameter.description: Payload word, reserved for later usage (Default: zero)

parameter.name: features
parameter.description: featureID followed by feature Version byte

parameter.name: features
